column1: Smoque BBQ////Delicious!!  Smoque is pretty no frills
column2: but it seems as they put all the extra energy straight into the food
column3: which was amazing.  This place can get busy
column4: so be prepared to wait a bit
column5: but they run an efficient operation
column6: so things move pretty fast. I had the brisket and my date had ribs. Both were fabulous
column7: which I may have mentioned a few times at this point. The rib meat pretty much just fell off the bone and the brisket had such a great flavor. An older gentleman who seemed to be somewhat in charge even brought over some more sauces and candied jalapenos for us to sample.  The sides were pretty great too
column11: you delivered some knock out food. Keep up the great work.
